channel.title: How to change minimum hit points from 10 to 1?
channel.description: when i go into my character file & change all my stats to 1 my hits only go down to 10.I would like to change the minimum hitpoints to level 1. resulting in level one combat. okay? ;D

item.title: How to change minimum hit points from 10 to 1?
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

[quote=“ziziz, post:1, topic:239406”]when i go into my character file & change all my stats to 1 my hits only go down to 10.I would like to change the minimum hitpoints to level 1. resulting in level one combat. okay? ;D[/quote]First off, you can manually change your combat to combat 1 with all your stats at 99
This is what you want or something similar?

Goto the class players.java
look for this: playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);

change it to :
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName);
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
if(p.connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(“127.0.0.1”))combatLevel=1;
playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);

With that, just compile and rerun, then everything works as long as you are connecting from the computer that runs the server … If not, then change it to if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOUR_NAME_HERE”)) …

Hope that solves your problem as thats completely different what you were asking for;
but it results in the target area where you wanted eh?

Read full topic
item.source: How to change minimum hit points from 10 to 1?
